properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v8

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Hey, digga din, Hey, digga din, down at the inn, Down at the inn, Down at the inn, Hey, digga din, Hey, digga din, down at the inn, Down at the inn, Everyone's down at the inn,

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: My lady's a hosteler, hosteler, hosteler, Such a fine hosteler she. All day she mounts horses, mounts horses, mounts horses; At night she comes home and drinks tea.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: My lord is a jester, a jester, a jester, And such a fine jester is he. All day he makes jokes, makes jokes, he makes jokes; At night he comes home and drinks tea.

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: My Lady's a herbalist, herbalist, herbalist, Such a fine herbalist she. All day she drinks tea, she drinks tea, she drinks tea; At night she does nothing but pee.
